meanings.definition: Relating to a corporation or group of corporations.
meanings.sent1: The corporative meeting discussed the company's future plans.
meanings.sent2: The corporative merger brought together two large businesses.
meanings.sent3: The corporative team-building exercise boosted morale among employees.
meanings.sent4: The corporative spirit within the organization was evident in every decision.
meanings.sent5: The corporative logo represented unity and strength.

meanings.definition: Involving cooperation or collaboration between different entities.
meanings.sent1: The corporative project required teamwork from all departments.
meanings.sent2: The corporative effort between the two companies led to success.
meanings.sent3: The corporative picnic was a fun way to bond with other businesses.
meanings.sent4: The corporative relationship between suppliers and manufacturers was crucial.
meanings.sent5: The corporative venture aimed to benefit all parties involved.
